UTM collector - v$utm_collector_ver  
UTM GUI - v0.52  
by Paresh Gupta

options.content: UTM - UCS Traffic Monitoring

options.content: UCS Domain Overview - $domain

targets.query: SELECT last("name") FROM "$db"."$rp"."FIEnvStats" WHERE ("domain" =~ /^$domain$/) AND $timeFilter
SELECT last("sys_uptime") AS "Uptime" FROM "$db"."$rp"."FIEnvStats" WHERE ("domain" =~ /^$domain$/) AND $timeFilter
select sum(last) as "Memory" from (SELECT last("memory") FROM "$db"."$rp"."Servers" WHERE ("domain" =~ /^$domain$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY domain,chassis,server,id) where $timeFilter
select sum(last) as "#CPU" from (SELECT last("num_cpus") FROM "$db"."$rp"."Servers" WHERE ("domain" =~ /^$domain$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY domain,chassis,server,id) where $timeFilter
select sum(last) as "#Cores" from (SELECT last("num_cores") FROM "$db"."$rp"."Servers" WHERE ("domain" =~ /^$domain$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY domain,chassis,server,id) where $timeFilter

select count(id) AS "Blade Servers" from (SELECT last("model") FROM "$db"."$rp"."Servers" WHERE ("domain" =~ /^$domain$/ AND "type" = 'blade') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval),domain,chassis,server,id) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

select count(id) AS "Rack Servers" from (SELECT last("model") FROM "$db"."$rp"."Servers" WHERE ("domain" =~ /^$domain$/ AND "type" = 'rack') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval),domain,chassis,server,id) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

select count(id) AS "OK" from (SELECT last("model") FROM "$db"."$rp"."Servers" WHERE ("domain" =~ /^$domain$/ AND "oper_state" = 'ok') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval),domain,chassis,server,id) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

select count(id) AS "Other" from (SELECT last("model") FROM "$db"."$rp"."Servers" WHERE ("domain" =~ /^$domain$/ AND "oper_state" != 'ok') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval),domain,chassis,server,id) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT last("ucsm_fw_ver") AS "UCSM version" FROM "$db"."$rp"."FIEnvStats" WHERE ("domain" =~ /^$domain$/) AND $timeFilter
select location from (select location,last(model) from "$db"."$rp"."FIEnvStats" where  ("domain" =~ /^$domain$/) AND $timeFilter) where $timeFilter
select sum(last) as "#vFC" from (SELECT last("num_vFCs") FROM "$db"."$rp"."Servers" WHERE ("domain" =~ /^$domain$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY domain,chassis,server ,id) where $timeFilter
select sum(last) as "#vEth" from (SELECT last("num_vEths") FROM "$db"."$rp"."Servers" WHERE ("domain" =~ /^$domain$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY domain,chassis,server,id) where $timeFilter

select sum(count) from (select count(distinct(chassis)) from (SELECT last("model") FROM "$db"."$rp"."Servers" WHERE ("domain" =~ /^$domain$/ AND chassis!='') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY service_profile,domain,chassis,id) group by domain) where $timeFilter

targets.query: SELECT last("leadership") as "leadership" FROM "$db"."$rp"."FIEnvStats" WHERE ("domain" =~ /^$domain$/ AND "fi_id" = 'A') AND $timeFilter

targets.query: SELECT last("leadership") as "leadership" FROM "$db"."$rp"."FIEnvStats" WHERE ("domain" =~ /^$domain$/ AND "fi_id" = 'B') AND $timeFilter

SELECT last("oob_if_ip") AS "OOB IP Address", last("serial") AS "Serial", last("model") AS "Model", last("fi_fw_sys_ver") AS "System Version" FROM "$db"."$rp"."FIEnvStats" WHERE ("domain" =~ /^$domain$/ AND "fi_id" = 'A') AND $timeFilter
SELECT last("load") AS "Load" FROM "$db"."$rp"."FIEnvStats" WHERE ("domain" =~ /^$domain$/ AND "fi_id" = 'A') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(linear)
SELECT last("total_memory")  as "Total" FROM "$db"."$rp"."FIEnvStats" WHERE ("domain" =~ /^$domain$/ AND "fi_id" =~ /A/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT last("mem_available") as "Available"  FROM "$db"."$rp"."FIEnvStats" WHERE ("domain" =~ /^$domain$/ AND "fi_id" =~ /A/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

SELECT (last("total_memory") - last("mem_available"))/last("total_memory")*100 FROM "$db"."$rp"."FIEnvStats" WHERE ("domain" =~ /^$domain$/ AND "fi_id" =~ /A/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

SELECT (last("total_memory") - last("mem_available"))/last("total_memory")*100 FROM "$db"."$rp"."FIEnvStats" WHERE ("domain" =~ /^$domain$/ AND "fi_id" =~ /B/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT last("total_memory")  as "Total" FROM "$db"."$rp"."FIEnvStats" WHERE ("domain" =~ /^$domain$/ AND "fi_id" =~ /B/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT last("mem_available") as "Available"  FROM "$db"."$rp"."FIEnvStats" WHERE ("domain" =~ /^$domain$/ AND "fi_id" =~ /B/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT last("load") AS "Load" FROM "$db"."$rp"."FIEnvStats" WHERE ("domain" =~ /^$domain$/ AND "fi_id" = 'B') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

SELECT last("oob_if_ip") AS "OOB IP Address", last("serial") AS "Serial", last("model") AS "Model", last("fi_fw_sys_ver") AS "System Version" FROM "$db"."$rp"."FIEnvStats" WHERE ("domain" =~ /^$domain$/ AND "fi_id" = 'B') AND $timeFilter
select count(last) from (SELECT last("oper_state") FROM "$db"."$rp"."FIUplinkPortStats" WHERE ("domain" =~ /^$domain$/ AND "channel" != '' and "fi_id" =~ /A/) and $timeFilter group by port)
select count(last) from (SELECT last("oper_state") FROM "$db"."$rp"."FIUplinkPortStats" WHERE ("domain" =~ /^$domain$/ AND "channel" != '' and "fi_id" =~ /B/) and $timeFilter group by port)

select count(last) AS "UP" from (SELECT last("oper_state") FROM "$db"."$rp"."FIUplinkPortStats" WHERE ("domain" =~ /^$domain$/ AND "channel" != '' AND "oper_state" = 'up' AND "fi_id" = 'A') and  $timeFilter group by domain,fi_id,port) where  $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

select count(last) AS "SFP not present" from (SELECT last("oper_state") FROM "$db"."$rp"."FIUplinkPortStats" WHERE ("domain" =~ /^$domain$/ AND "channel" != '' AND "oper_state" = 'sfp-not-present' AND "fi_id" = 'A') and  $timeFilter group by domain,fi_id,port) where  $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

select count(last) AS "Admin down" from (SELECT last("oper_state") FROM "$db"."$rp"."FIUplinkPortStats" WHERE ("domain" =~ /^$domain$/ AND "channel" != '' AND "oper_state" = 'admin-down' AND "fi_id" = 'A') and  $timeFilter group by domain,fi_id,port) where  $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

select count(last) AS "Failed" from (SELECT last("oper_state") FROM "$db"."$rp"."FIUplinkPortStats" WHERE ("domain" =~ /^$domain$/ AND "channel" != '' AND "oper_state" = 'failed' AND "fi_id" = 'A') and  $timeFilter group by domain,fi_id,port) where  $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

select count(last) AS "Link Down" from (SELECT last("oper_state") FROM "$db"."$rp"."FIUplinkPortStats" WHERE ("domain" =~ /^$domain$/ AND "channel" != '' AND "oper_state" = 'link-down' AND "fi_id" = 'A') and  $timeFilter group by domain,fi_id,port) where  $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

select count(last) AS "FC" from (SELECT last("oper_state") FROM "$db"."$rp"."FIUplinkPortStats" WHERE ("domain" =~ /^$domain$/ AND "channel" != '' AND "transport" = 'FC' AND "fi_id" = 'A' ) and $timeFilter group by time($__interval),domain,fi_id,port) where $timeFilter group by time($__interval)

select count(last) AS "Ethernet" from (SELECT last("oper_state") FROM "$db"."$rp"."FIUplinkPortStats" WHERE ("domain" =~ /^$domain$/ AND "channel" != '' AND "transport" = 'Eth' AND "fi_id" = 'A' ) and  $timeFilter group by time($__interval),domain,fi_id,port) where  $timeFilter group by time($__interval)

select count(last) AS "UP" from (SELECT last("oper_state") FROM "$db"."$rp"."FIUplinkPortStats" WHERE ("domain" =~ /^$domain$/ AND "channel" != '' AND "oper_state" = 'up' AND "fi_id" = 'B') and  $timeFilter group by domain,fi_id,port) where  $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

select count(last) AS "SFP not present" from (SELECT last("oper_state") FROM "$db"."$rp"."FIUplinkPortStats" WHERE ("domain" =~ /^$domain$/ AND "channel" != '' AND "oper_state" = 'sfp-not-present' AND "fi_id" = 'B') and  $timeFilter group by domain,fi_id,port) where  $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

select count(last) AS "Admin down" from (SELECT last("oper_state") FROM "$db"."$rp"."FIUplinkPortStats" WHERE ("domain" =~ /^$domain$/ AND "channel" != '' AND "oper_state" = 'admin-down' AND "fi_id" = 'B') and  $timeFilter group by domain,fi_id,port) where  $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

select count(last) AS "Failed" from (SELECT last("oper_state") FROM "$db"."$rp"."FIUplinkPortStats" WHERE ("domain" =~ /^$domain$/ AND "channel" != '' AND "oper_state" = 'failed' AND "fi_id" = 'B') and  $timeFilter group by domain,fi_id,port) where  $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

select count(last) AS "Link Down" from (SELECT last("oper_state") FROM "$db"."$rp"."FIUplinkPortStats" WHERE ("domain" =~ /^$domain$/ AND "channel" != '' AND "oper_state" = 'link-down' AND "fi_id" = 'B') and  $timeFilter group by domain,fi_id,port) where  $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

select count(last) AS "FC" from (SELECT last("oper_state") FROM "$db"."$rp"."FIUplinkPortStats" WHERE ("domain" =~ /^$domain$/ AND "channel" != '' AND "transport" = 'FC' AND "fi_id" = 'B' ) and $timeFilter group by time($__interval),domain,fi_id,port) where $timeFilter group by time($__interval)

select count(last) AS "Ethernet" from (SELECT last("oper_state") FROM "$db"."$rp"."FIUplinkPortStats" WHERE ("domain" =~ /^$domain$/ AND "channel" != '' AND "transport" = 'Eth' AND "fi_id" = 'B' ) and  $timeFilter group by time($__interval),domain,fi_id,port) where  $timeFilter group by time($__interval)

select count(last) AS "1 Gbps" from (SELECT last("oper_state") FROM "$db"."$rp"."FIUplinkPortStats" WHERE ("domain" =~ /^$domain$/ AND "channel" != '' AND "fi_id" = 'A' AND  transport = 'Eth' AND "oper_speed" = 1) and $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval),domain,fi_id,port) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

select count(last) AS "10 Gbps" from (SELECT last("oper_state") FROM "$db"."$rp"."FIUplinkPortStats" WHERE ("domain" =~ /^$domain$/ AND "channel" != '' AND "fi_id" = 'A' AND  transport = 'Eth' AND "oper_speed" = 10) and $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval),domain,fi_id,port) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

select count(last) AS "40 Gbps" from (SELECT last("oper_state") FROM "$db"."$rp"."FIUplinkPortStats" WHERE ("domain" =~ /^$domain$/ AND "channel" != '' AND "fi_id" = 'A' AND  transport = 'Eth' AND "oper_speed" = 40) and $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval),domain,fi_id,port) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

select count(last) AS "25 Gbps" from (SELECT last("oper_state") FROM "$db"."$rp"."FIUplinkPortStats" WHERE ("domain" =~ /^$domain$/ AND "channel" != '' AND "fi_id" = 'A' AND  transport = 'Eth' AND "oper_speed" = 25) and $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval),domain,fi_id,port) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

select count(last) AS "4G" from (SELECT last("oper_state") FROM "$db"."$rp"."FIUplinkPortStats" WHERE ("domain" =~ /^$domain$/ AND "channel" != '' AND transport = 'FC' AND "oper_speed" = 4 AND "fi_id" = 'A' ) and $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval),domain,fi_id,port) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

select count(last) AS "8G" from (SELECT last("oper_state") FROM "$db"."$rp"."FIUplinkPortStats" WHERE ("domain" =~ /^$domain$/ AND "channel" != '' AND  transport = 'FC' AND "oper_speed" = 8 AND "fi_id" = 'A' ) and $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval),domain,fi_id,port) where  $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

select count(last) AS "16G" from (SELECT last("oper_state") FROM "$db"."$rp"."FIUplinkPortStats" WHERE ("domain" =~ /^$domain$/ AND "channel" != '' AND  transport = 'FC' AND "oper_speed" = 16 AND "fi_id" = 'A' ) and $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval),domain,fi_id,port) where  $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

select count(last) AS "32G" from (SELECT last("oper_state") FROM "$db"."$rp"."FIUplinkPortStats" WHERE ("domain" =~ /^$domain$/ AND "channel" != '' AND  transport = 'FC' AND "oper_speed" = 32 AND "fi_id" = 'A' ) and $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval),domain,fi_id,port) where  $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

select count(last) AS "1 Gbps" from (SELECT last("oper_state") FROM "$db"."$rp"."FIUplinkPortStats" WHERE ("domain" =~ /^$domain$/ AND "channel" != '' AND "fi_id" = 'B' AND  transport = 'Eth' AND "oper_speed" = 1) and $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval),domain,fi_id,port) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

select count(last) AS "10 Gbps" from (SELECT last("oper_state") FROM "$db"."$rp"."FIUplinkPortStats" WHERE ("domain" =~ /^$domain$/ AND "channel" != '' AND "fi_id" = 'B' AND  transport = 'Eth' AND "oper_speed" = 10) and $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval),domain,fi_id,port) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

select count(last) AS "40 Gbps" from (SELECT last("oper_state") FROM "$db"."$rp"."FIUplinkPortStats" WHERE ("domain" =~ /^$domain$/ AND "channel" != '' AND "fi_id" = 'B' AND  transport = 'Eth' AND "oper_speed" = 40) and $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval),domain,fi_id,port) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

select count(last) AS "25 Gbps" from (SELECT last("oper_state") FROM "$db"."$rp"."FIUplinkPortStats" WHERE ("domain" =~ /^$domain$/ AND "channel" != '' AND "fi_id" = 'B' AND  transport = 'Eth' AND "oper_speed" = 25) and $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval),domain,fi_id,port) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

select count(last) AS "4G" from (SELECT last("oper_state") FROM "$db"."$rp"."FIUplinkPortStats" WHERE ("domain" =~ /^$domain$/ AND "channel" != '' AND  transport = 'FC' AND "oper_speed" = 4 AND "fi_id" = 'B' ) and $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval),domain,fi_id,port) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

select count(last) AS "8G" from (SELECT last("oper_state") FROM "$db"."$rp"."FIUplinkPortStats" WHERE ("domain" =~ /^$domain$/ AND "channel" != '' AND  transport = 'FC' AND "oper_speed" = 8 AND "fi_id" = 'B' ) and $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval),domain,fi_id,port) where  $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

select count(last) AS "16G" from (SELECT last("oper_state") FROM "$db"."$rp"."FIUplinkPortStats" WHERE ("domain" =~ /^$domain$/ AND "channel" != '' AND  transport = 'FC' AND "oper_speed" = 16 AND "fi_id" = 'B' ) and $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval),domain,fi_id,port) where  $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

select count(last) AS "32G" from (SELECT last("oper_state") FROM "$db"."$rp"."FIUplinkPortStats" WHERE ("domain" =~ /^$domain$/ AND "channel" != '' AND  transport = 'FC' AND "oper_speed" = 32 AND "fi_id" = 'B' ) and $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval),domain,fi_id,port) where  $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

select count(last) from (SELECT last("oper_state") FROM "$db"."$rp"."FIServerPortStats" WHERE ("domain" =~ /^$domain$/ AND "channel" != '' AND fi_id = 'A') and  $timeFilter group by domain,fi_id,port) where $timeFilter

select count(last) from (SELECT last("oper_state") FROM "$db"."$rp"."FIServerPortStats" WHERE ("domain" =~ /^$domain$/ AND "channel" != '' AND fi_id = 'B') and  $timeFilter group by domain,fi_id,port) where $timeFilter

select count(last) AS "UP" from (SELECT last("oper_state") FROM "$db"."$rp"."FIServerPortStats" WHERE ("domain" =~ /^$domain$/ AND "channel" != '' AND "oper_state" = 'up' AND "fi_id" = 'A') and  $timeFilter group by domain,fi_id,port) where  $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

select count(last) AS "SFP not present" from (SELECT last("oper_state") FROM "$db"."$rp"."FIServerPortStats" WHERE ("domain" =~ /^$domain$/ AND "channel" != '' AND "oper_state" = 'sfp-not-present' AND "fi_id" = 'A') and  $timeFilter group by domain,fi_id,port) where  $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

select count(last) AS "Admin down" from (SELECT last("oper_state") FROM "$db"."$rp"."FIServerPortStats" WHERE ("domain" =~ /^$domain$/ AND "channel" != '' AND "oper_state" = 'admin-down' AND "fi_id" = 'A') and  $timeFilter group by domain,fi_id,port) where  $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

select count(last) AS "Failed" from (SELECT last("oper_state") FROM "$db"."$rp"."FIServerPortStats" WHERE ("domain" =~ /^$domain$/ AND "channel" != '' AND "oper_state" = 'failed' AND "fi_id" = 'A') and  $timeFilter group by domain,fi_id,port) where  $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

select count(last) AS "Link Down" from (SELECT last("oper_state") FROM "$db"."$rp"."FIServerPortStats" WHERE ("domain" =~ /^$domain$/ AND "channel" != '' AND "oper_state" = 'link-down' AND "fi_id" = 'A') and  $timeFilter group by domain,fi_id,port) where  $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

select count(last) AS "1 Gbps" from (SELECT last("oper_state") FROM "$db"."$rp"."FIServerPortStats" WHERE ("domain" =~ /^$domain$/ AND "channel" != '' AND "fi_id" = 'A' AND "oper_speed" = 1) and $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval),domain,fi_id,port) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

select count(last) AS "10 Gbps" from (SELECT last("oper_state") FROM "$db"."$rp"."FIServerPortStats" WHERE ("domain" =~ /^$domain$/ AND "channel" != '' AND "fi_id" = 'A' AND "oper_speed" = 10) and $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval),domain,fi_id,port) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

select count(last) AS "40 Gbps" from (SELECT last("oper_state") FROM "$db"."$rp"."FIServerPortStats" WHERE ("domain" =~ /^$domain$/ AND "channel" != '' AND "fi_id" = 'A' AND "oper_speed" = 40) and $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval),domain,fi_id,port) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

select count(last) AS "25 Gbps" from (SELECT last("oper_state") FROM "$db"."$rp"."FIServerPortStats" WHERE ("domain" =~ /^$domain$/ AND "channel" != '' AND "fi_id" = 'A' AND "oper_speed" = 25) and $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval),domain,fi_id,port) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

select count(last) AS "UP" from (SELECT last("oper_state") FROM "$db"."$rp"."FIServerPortStats" WHERE ("domain" =~ /^$domain$/ AND "channel" != '' AND "oper_state" = 'up' AND "fi_id" = 'B') and  $timeFilter group by domain,fi_id,port) where  $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

select count(last) AS "SFP not present" from (SELECT last("oper_state") FROM "$db"."$rp"."FIServerPortStats" WHERE ("domain" =~ /^$domain$/ AND "channel" != '' AND "oper_state" = 'sfp-not-present' AND "fi_id" = 'B') and  $timeFilter group by domain,fi_id,port) where  $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

select count(last) AS "Admin down" from (SELECT last("oper_state") FROM "$db"."$rp"."FIServerPortStats" WHERE ("domain" =~ /^$domain$/ AND "channel" != '' AND "oper_state" = 'admin-down' AND "fi_id" = 'B') and  $timeFilter group by domain,fi_id,port) where  $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

select count(last) AS "Failed" from (SELECT last("oper_state") FROM "$db"."$rp"."FIServerPortStats" WHERE ("domain" =~ /^$domain$/ AND "channel" != '' AND "oper_state" = 'failed' AND "fi_id" = 'B') and  $timeFilter group by domain,fi_id,port) where  $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

select count(last) AS "Link Down" from (SELECT last("oper_state") FROM "$db"."$rp"."FIServerPortStats" WHERE ("domain" =~ /^$domain$/ AND "channel" != '' AND "oper_state" = 'link-down' AND "fi_id" = 'B') and  $timeFilter group by domain,fi_id,port) where  $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

select count(last) AS "1 Gbps" from (SELECT last("oper_state") FROM "$db"."$rp"."FIServerPortStats" WHERE ("domain" =~ /^$domain$/ AND "channel" != '' AND "fi_id" = 'B' AND "oper_speed" = 1) and $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval),domain,fi_id,port) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

select count(last) AS "10 Gbps" from (SELECT last("oper_state") FROM "$db"."$rp"."FIServerPortStats" WHERE ("domain" =~ /^$domain$/ AND "channel" != '' AND "fi_id" = 'B' AND "oper_speed" = 10) and $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval),domain,fi_id,port) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

select count(last) AS "40 Gbps" from (SELECT last("oper_state") FROM "$db"."$rp"."FIServerPortStats" WHERE ("domain" =~ /^$domain$/ AND "channel" != '' AND "fi_id" = 'B' AND "oper_speed" = 40) and $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval),domain,fi_id,port) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

select count(last) AS "25 Gbps" from (SELECT last("oper_state") FROM "$db"."$rp"."FIServerPortStats" WHERE ("domain" =~ /^$domain$/ AND "channel" != '' AND "fi_id" = 'B' AND "oper_speed" = 25) and $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval),domain,fi_id,port) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

value.title: Details of traffic in Chassis ${__data.fields.Chassis} in UCS Domain ${__data.fields.Domain}

targets.query: SELECT last(model) as "Model", last(serial) as "Serial", last(num_cpus) as "# CPU", last(num_cores) as "# Cores", last(memory )as "Memory", last(operability) as "Operability", last(oper_state) as "Operational State", last(oper_state_code) as oper_state_code, last(num_vEths) as "# vEth", last(num_vFCs) as "# vFC" FROM "$db"."$rp"."Servers" WHERE ("domain" =~ /^$domain$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY service_profile,location,domain,chassis,id

list.definition: show tag values from "$db"."$rp"."FIEnvStats" with key=domain where $timeFilter
list.label: UCS Domain
list.name: domain
list.query: show tag values from "$db"."$rp"."FIEnvStats" with key=domain where $timeFilter
